content:
You can attach a few files for test decryption by packing them into an archive with zip, rar, tar, 7zip, 7z, tar.gz extensions of no more than 10 megabytes using the attach button directly in the chat.

If your archive weighs more than 10 megabytes, please use our file sharing service.
http://lockbitfss2w7co3ij6am6wox4xcurtgwukunx3yubcoe5cbxiqakxqd.onion
http://lockbitfsvf75glg226he5inkfgtuoakt4vgfhd7nfgghx5kwz5zo3ad.onion
http://lockbitfskq2fxclyfrop5yizyxpzu65w7pphsgthawcyb4gd27x62id.onion
For security reasons we do not click on other links you send in chat.
Please wait for a reply, sometimes it takes several hours due to possible time zone differences.
how much
30k$ in bitcoin
HI
hi
30 K USD in bit?
yes
after i pay how can u help me?
after payment you will be able to decrypt all company files, it will be easy, but our support is always available for you
30K is too high for us.
20% discount may be for you if you are ready to close the discuss quickly
Can you give me some confidence first? Try unlocking part of the system for me so that I can convince my supervisor.
you can make a test decryptor of some small files, just send the archive here in the chat
How should I send the file to you?
http://lockbitfskq2fxclyfrop5yizyxpzu65w7pphsgthawcyb4gd27x62id.onion/
upload here
http://lockbitfskq2fxclyfrop5yizyxpzu65w7pphsgthawcyb4gd27x62id.onion/r/LZVeRGfa17#XMaP5fIrsmRRrIGAHd+aF8hBCL6/8BJakWKT7sizMrc=
wait pls
you need to wait for tech support, sometimes it takes time
ok
How long will it take? I might need to rest later.
i submitted a request, not online yet, till tomorrow for sure.
ok
If there is any news, please let me know
I'm sorry, but you have to wait. It's just that our tech support is not always online every day, they should come today to do it
you can read for us in Google and not worry, we are responsible for our reputation
Can we know which country your organization is from? We are asking this because we want to clarify whether we are being attacked by a domestic competitor.
No, it's definitely not your competitors, we had nothing to do with it.
test decryptor will be done today, if you are ready to pay you can do the exchange for cryptocurrency, it will take time.
after payment, we will inform you of your mistake so that this does not happen again
Sorry for having this thought. Our boss has helped many charity organizations, which might have affected certain people's interests. That's why we asked you this question.
Thks for u help
Additionally, we would like to know if USDT can be used for payment besides Bitcoin.
No, we only work with bitcoin, this is done for our security
no, we have nothing to do with this, your company appeared with us randomly because of your simple password
I will be gone for a few hours now, I hope that when I return you will have the decryptor test
Also, please help us restore the files we sent yesterday.thks
Yes, of course. We'll do the test decrypt, then you can decide whether to pay or not.
I appreciate it. You surely understand that I am just an employee, so please don't make things difficult for me. Thks

don't worry, usually the decryptor test is done quickly, but it doesn't depend on me. After payment the full decryptor will be available immediately, you just need to run it, but if it is not clear I will help you
Thank you. After the payment, will the decryption be done through a program, or what method will be used? Could you let me know in advance?
I saw local news reporting that many companies have been successfully breached. Was it all done by you?
Give me log files for test decrypt
you gived Huato-CPS_1-flat.vmdk_meta.8F33a442hKl3GlPZGFJ
it's meta files of our encryptor

after payment you will have available to the decryptor for win and esxi, with instructed.
if there are any questions by decrypt, the support service is open

Was it all done by you? no, we only have a few companies in the works.
make a new archive for decryption test, log file vm and possibly for win system
Here?
yes
here?
Is your Bitcoin account on an exchange?
no
How should I send you Bitcoin?
1BnSNSLk1zA3Jmcv6CMPqVmbMGwJrHThrp
btc wallet
We don't have this technology, please teach us.

you need to buy bitcoin through exchangers in your country
e.g. binance,coinbase,bitfinex
Then how should I send it to you?
First you register and up your bitcoin wallet, then transfer to ours
or you can search for a private exchanger and they transfer directly to our wallet
Private exchangers are harder to find in our country.
https://cex.io/buy-bitcoin-in-china
Bro, we are in Taiwan, not China. We hate China.
If I provide the IP of a mainland Chinese company, can you attack it?
we do more china, we have enough companies)
https://bit2me.com/country-taiwan
what china company ?
We will pay, but you need to give me some time to convince my boss.
But you must say China is shit!!!!!!!
It is a publicly listed Chinese company. What information do I need to provide you?
we love working with China, they pay well)
need site
I'll just check out the website.

https://www.yusheng.com.tw
This is their Taiwan branch, and all the money is here. I will prioritize providing it to you.
They are very wealthy. When you succeed, please ask for more.
ok we will check them
you name leo.lin?
That was our MIS. Because of your actions, he resigned voluntarily and left the mess to me. My name is Mike.
I hate that idiot Leo.
mike chang
Nice to meet you.
yes you had security issues

I know, so I have also told the company to make the payment. However, most people are against it, so I have been pushing for it. I understand that the problem comes from our side, so please give me more time.
tell the boss I can go back and make it worse, your pcs they just won't turn on anymore.
I'm in no hurry. I have a lot of work to do.

I know because I can see that you deliberately left the servers operational but locked the information. I also told them that your reputation internationally is very good. However, since this is the first time the company has encountered such a situation, it is understandable that they are afraid of being attacked again after unlocking it.

Don't misunderstand, I was suddenly assigned to replace someone, and my position is not high enough. So they haven't quickly accepted my opinion. Give me a little more time, and I will try to convince them.

no after payment, there is no point in doing it again. We are not limited to companies, but there are those who have paid others in the past and are paying us again, due to the vulnerability not being fixed
this amount is small for us, I have no worries.

I know it's small for you, but it's not small for us. I understand that this is our problem, so there's no one else to blame. In fact, after talking to you for a while, I even feel grateful to you. After all, your actions have made the company realize the importance of cybersecurity. If things go smoothly, I might even get a promotion. Many thanks!
after payment, I will tell you what you can easily fix so that this does not happen again
Will this chat remain after the payment is made?
will be deleted over time, but you will still have links to create a new chat
or I can delete the chat right away
Got it. I was just thinking that if there are any issues in the future, I could consult you.
yes, you can create a new chat using the link in the note
Great! I think you're a good person, and I don't want to lose contact with you.
I learned to use the dark web because of this incident. Do you have any recommended dark web sites that I can browse? A safe place.
https://hackforums.net/
I can't access this forum, the system has blocked me.
vpn you know
Bro, I want to ask for your advice. If I want to make some extra money on the side but do it safely like you guys, do you have any recommended directions?
we now have open registration in the panel lockbit, but it costs 777$.
After joining, what can I help with? I don’t have any particular skills. If possible, can I join?
you don't need it
yo bro
Get up, please tell me?
what？
I secured $20K worth of Bitcoin to exchange with you for the decryption method. Is that acceptable?
I will have someone transfer it from a private wallet, but I need to wait until they wake up later.
yo Bro
you don't seem like a bad person, let's agree 20k
btc wallet 1BnSNSLk1zA3Jmcv6CMPqVmbMGwJrHThrp
I know, my boss asked me to do it.
I'll talk to him about the price.Give me some time.
ok
I'll ask first, if the decryption is successful, will you give me a program? How will you send it to me?
I didn't understand what program ?)
after payment, a decryptor will be sent here in the chat

Is the decryption tool with you, or do we need to wait for the technical team? Also, do you know which tool corresponds to decrypting our files? I've heard that each company has a different decryption key.
don't worry, send a decryptor from tech support, it's unique for each company, there is a version for esxi and win
Okay, because I'm worried that the technical staff might not be available. Is he working today?
so you understand, only one person has access to the decryptor, and that's the boss)
yesterday and today was here. But sometimes you have to wait for it, usually no more than 24 hours
I know~ So I just want to confirm when he is available, that way the transaction will be faster, and my stress will be lower. So, I appreciate your help.
tell me how long it will take you to pay and I can check if he will be there
I will let you know once I get the Bitcoin because many exchanges now have risk controls that prevent me from buying too much. I am trying to buy from individuals instead.
ok, we are here now for 5-6 hours
I still haven't received their message, so I probably won't be able to pick it up today. I'll get it in a couple of days and contact you then, okay?
no problem
Here?
24K USD is approximately 0.2455 BTC. Is this okay?
hi bro, yes right
ＯＫ,Is the boss in today?
I haven't seen it yet today, but it should be later
If he shows up, let me know.
ok
here
Sorry bro, I’ve been sick for a few days.
are you ready to pay ?
Can you help me ask if your boss will be there tomorrow? Buying Bitcoin is really troublesome; the exchange keeps blocking me. I should be able to collect it tomorrow."
boss is here every day
Okay, my friend has transferred it to me using a wallet, and I'll transfer it to you. Can I confirm the address with you again?
1BWbqn6xdFat3zLiaHPuFLqnZL7Q4obSKC
I expect to receive it tomorrow afternoon if there are no issues.
But brot, please, I beg you to unlock it for me. This is a large amount, and if I can't unlock it, you will make me lose my job. I really trust you. Thank you.
after payment, you will not have problems with decryption
Bro, you promised me, right? Because I heard that with 4.0, many people paid but didn't get the decryption.
where is this written
There are many articles on the Taiwanese internet saying that decryption will not be received.
lies
I can refuse you
all this is not serious anymore
From our conversation, I feel that you are a good person. You wouldn't deceive me, right?
If you pay
waiting for your payment
Hey bro, do you know where to buy some girl on the dark web?
By the way, after payment, will you also tell us where the vulnerability is?
weak passwords
why are you wasting your time
if you're not going to pay
We really intend to pay, but Bitcoin's price has been very strong recently, and there are very few holders in Taiwan. Also, I was sick and unable to work for the past few days.
he A flu virus has been spreading in Asia recently, and I had a fever for two days.
I can suggest that if you can accept payments in USDT, people in Taiwan will be able to pay faster. USDT is more commonly used here.
only btc
I have enough clients, some pay, some don't, I don't care

Of course, I'm just letting you know that I finally convinced our boss because we trust you as a person. But I just need a little more time because obtaining Bitcoin is difficult. Besides, I also want to learn more from you.
I'm not in a hurry, when you're ready to pay, write
everyone gets a decryptor after payment, we have a reputation
THX
your tw colleagues found bitcoin and paid for it in one day, it was this week
I also expect payments not only from you
we don't have a kindergarten here, we've been working here for 6 years
I will make the payment within these two days, I promise.
okay, we're here every day.
Before making the payment, I will confirm with you whether your boss is available to ensure the transaction goes smoothly and quickly.
ok
What time are you usually online? That way, I can better coordinate with the Bitcoin trader.
in the afternoon your time
If I make the payment within these two days, and also send the $777 membership fee to the same account, can I join you?
only by himself, not with me
Ｍorning, bro. Are you up?
Hi
Hi
what you want?
Boss here?
yes
I am boss
Do you have the program to unlock our data?
yes
30k$ in bitcoin
We will proceed with the payment. How will you deliver the program to me?
in this chat
I will give you exe file for decrypt
Last time, this account told me 24K. We are ready now.
ok 24k
give money and I will give you decryptor
Please give me the wallet address again.Approximately 0.2458 BTC.
you will pay now?
Give me five minutes to get approval from my boss. Please provide the address in the meantime.
bc1qvltxkhn7njvd9gqegsurkv6y97j4rum5kyr2n2
1BWbqn6xdFat3zLiaHPuFLqnZL7Q4obSKC No this one？
it's affilate wallet, I am boss
you can sent 80% to affilate 20% to me
You are the boss, so I can give it directly to you in exchange for the password, right?
yes

I will proceed with the transfer. Since there are two accounts, I want to confirm that I will receive the key after payment, because it's clear that you are not the same person as the one in the chat before.
After the payment, you will immediately teach me how to unlock it, right?
boss say OK R U here
hi
yes.here
bc1qvltxkhn7njvd9gqegsurkv6y97j4rum5kyr2n2 This Right?
no
where did you get this wallet, it's not ours
this 1BWbqn6xdFat3zLiaHPuFLqnZL7Q4obSKC

transfer 10$ first
btc transfer here here 1BWbqn6xdFat3zLiaHPuFLqnZL7Q4obSKC
and only me talked to you
1BWbqn6xdFat3zLiaHPuFLqnZL7Q4obSKC Final confirmation.
Right?
1BWbqn6xdFat3zLiaHPuFLqnZL7Q4obSKC yes  right
Sent 0.07 BTC, please check."
Did you receive it?
I confirm received 0.07
Should I send the next payment to the same address?
yes
Please provide me with the program immediately after completion. My boss is right beside me. Thank you.
don't worry, everything will be fine with you
but you will have to wait for some time, there is no other way
Sent, please confirm
but the decryptor will be done today.
I also need to confirm the payment and give the % to the boss, only after he sees the decryptor will be ready
I confirm received all 0.24500000
It shows that the transfer is complete, please confirm.
you must believe me, you won't be deceived here
I confirm received all 0.24500000
allright
There was an issue with the transaction fee that I didn't calculate properly. I overlooked that, and it's slightly short.
Is the transaction complete? Can you give me the decryptor now? My boss is asking.
all amount is received, i sent % to the boss and requested a decryptor
please don't worry, just wait a little
Thanks, bro. I appreciate it. Please send it to me as soon as possible.
we'll wait for him together.
I can't do anything here, our boss is working on the update and is very busy now, we'll have to wait and see how he will be
and you had to pay immediately, because without % of the boss, we will not get an answer from him
this is how it works, but I say again, there is no deception here
Payment? I just paid 0.245 BTC. What else do I need to pay?
look at our blog and see how many companies are out there, and just think about whether or not we're scamming them.
you paid, allright
just wait decryptor here in the chat
Okay, thanks, bro.
do you need a decryptor for esxi or win ?
ESXi
win not needed ?
I'll send you the instructions for the esxi
Please provide it as well, as I am the one taking over and I'm not entirely sure about the full situation. Thank you.
I wrote above that we're waiting for a decryptor from the boss.

Procedure for decrypting ESXi:
- log in to vCenter
- enable ssh access to ESXi
- upload decryptor to ESXi via WinSCP or FileZilla; navigate to /tmp folder
- login to ssh with root privileges
- set permissions to run the decryptor with the command - chmod 777 decrypt
- launch decryptor ./decrypt
- follow the first method of decrypting by viewing the log file: tail -f /tmp/decrypt.llg, wait for the message at the end of the log - Your system is decrypted
- the second way is to check the presence on the disk file decrypt.pid command ls, which protects the decryptor from the restart
- the third way - ps | grep decrypt, as soon as decrypt.pid will be removed from the disk, or decrypt will disappear from the running processes, decrypt is complete
- check the decrypt.llg log file and see the message at the end that the system was successfully decrypted "Your system is decrypted"
- turn on virtual machines in ESXi

You cannot run multiple copies of a decryptor at the same time. After launching, the decryptor deletes the executable file and is demonetized, so that you cannot run the decryptor again and damage the files, this is normal.

If you have more than one ESXi host then you should not run the decryptor on all hosts simultaneously, make the decryption alternately, in the case of simultaneous operation of two decryptors may corrupt files and not be able to decrypt

If any files in another folder stay crypted, please use this command with path
Example:
./decrypt -i /tmp/files1/
I'm also very interested in joining you. My job in the real world is not ideal.
Is this the correct decryption process? No other programs are needed?
You won't succeed, you need to learn this for a long time
Now we're just waiting for the decryptor itself.
So our vulnerability is simply that the password was too weak?
host admin needs to be removed from the domain
and close the ports at the admin
Got it!!ＴＨＸ！
backups do not show in the domain
and nas
domain is not a secure infostructure
Got it, we’ll take this as a lesson learned. Thanks for the assistance.
and of course passwords, but they won't help you if there are vulnerabilities in the domain
I'm glad you keep your word, you are a great person, and you've also taught us a lot.
now just don't worry, the boss will see it and send you a decryptor
Okay, will it take long？
this week we got decryptors for others quickly, I hope it will be the same now
you're gonna be fine.
and I will be here too
if you need help later with decryption
kay, thank you. I can't afford to lose this job. Thanks.
ok we'll wait
Thx
I'm going to have a meal and will be away for a while. If the program is ready, please send it over.
boss here
wait decryptor in 5 min
Great! Thank you!
